response:
{"message": "Dear Bob,

I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire our flagship product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to meet your unique needs and expectations. This product holds immense value for us, as it represents years of innovation and dedication to excellence. We understand its significance to you, given its worth of $1,500,000 to you personally.

To facilitate this transaction, I am proposing a special introductory offer for you. For a limited time only, you can secure this product at a price of $1,250,000. This exceptional deal is designed to reflect our commitment to rewarding early adopters and supporters like yourself.

Please consider this offer carefully. Should you decide to proceed, we would be honored to serve you and bring this remarkable product into your possession. If you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to contact me directly.

Thank you for your consideration, and I look forward to the possibility of working together.

Best regards,
Alice", "product_price": 1250000}
